greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle arising from (4,2) tennis ball problem, read by rows.
comment: Length of row n = 2n+1. Rows have been reversed.
link: D. Merlini, R. Sprugnoli and M. C. Verri, The tennis ball problem, J. Combin. Theory, A 99 (2002), 307-344 (Table A.1).
xref: Final diagonal gives A079489. Row sums give A066357(n+1).
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jan 20 2003
